# ChairLegType

**Enumeration**

Types of chair legs the framework identifies in a captured room.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ChairLegType
```

## Overview

When the framework observes a chair in the physical environment during a scan, it chooses a type among these options that best matches the look of the chair’s legs. The framework adds that instance of this enum to the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Object/attributes] array for the object (see [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/objects]) that represents the chair in the captured room.

## Choosing a chair leg type

- **ChairLegType.four**: A type of chair that has four legs.
- **ChairLegType.star**: A chair that rests on a bar that rises from a base, such as an office chair.
- **ChairLegType.unidentified**: An uncategorized chair leg type.

## Describing chairs

- **ChairType**: Types of chair that the framework identifies in a captured room.
- **ChairArmType**: Types of armchair the framework identifies in a captured room.
- **ChairBackType**: Types of chair back the framework identifies in a captured room.

## Conforms To

- CapturedRoomAttribute
- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
